## Blue

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(slickR)
slickR(list.files("D:/PADADA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL/Website/Website 1/PNHS1/gallery/Blue", pattern = 'png', full.names = TRUE), height = 200, width = '95%')+settings(dots=TRUE, initialSlide = 0, slidesToShow = 3, slidesToScroll = 3, focusOnSelect = TRUE)
```
